entry.title: Neko Case: ‘Wreck’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Neko Case: ‘Wreck’

 Best New Music

Singer-songwriter, author , and transcendent storyteller across all mediums— Neko Case —recently announced her first new music of the decade(!).

Aug. 1

entry.title: Fruit Bats: ‘Stuck In My Head Again’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Fruit Bats: ‘Stuck In My Head Again’

 Best New Music

We are so happy to report that 2000s indie rock darlings Fruit Bats have a new album on the horizon. Baby Man (due Sept. 12 via Merge) finds Fruit Bats’ main man Eric D.

Jul. 31

entry.title: Sofia Kourtesis: ‘Canela Pura’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Sofia Kourtesis: ‘Canela Pura’

 Best New Music

Peruvian producer Sofia Kourtesis hits us with a shot of sonic adrenaline (aka new single “Canela Pura”).

Jul. 30

entry.title: Slightly Stoopid: ‘Step Into The Sun’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Slightly Stoopid: ‘Step Into The Sun’

 Best New Music

San Diego celebs Slightly Stoopid supercharge the summer vibes on their new single “Step Into The Sun.” This feel-good anthem celebrates life, love, and understanding.

Jul. 29

entry.title: Tom Vek: ‘C-C (You Set The Fire In Me) (Dave Glass Animals Remix)’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Tom Vek: ‘C-C (You Set The Fire In Me) (Dave Glass Animals Remix)’

 Best New Music

Multi-instrumentalist Tom Vek celebrates the twentieth anniversary of his cult-classic, debut album We Have Sound with a ten track remix version.

Jul. 28

entry.title: Sly & The Family Stone: ‘I Gotta Go Now (Up On The Floor) / Funky Broadway’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Sly & The Family Stone: ‘I Gotta Go Now (Up On The Floor) / Funky Broadway’

 Best New Music

Sly & The Family Stone ’s earliest days as a live band are finally on the record via today’s release of The First Family: Live at Winchester Cathedral 1967.

Jul. 25

entry.title: The Beths: ‘Metal’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
The Beths: ‘Metal’

 Best New Music

New Zealanders The Beths have a bouncy, ‘90s-esque-jangle-rock sound that keeps us feeling forever young.

Jul. 24

entry.title: ELESTELA: ‘Bounce Back’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
ELESTELA: ‘Bounce Back’

 Best New Music

Elvin Estela is a hero of the LA underground. Most notably as a co-founder of the taste-making club night Low End Theory, and producing boundary-expanding beats as Nobody.

Jul. 23
